quote.text: She remembered who she was and the game changed.
quote.author: Lalah Delia

scripture.text: God is within her,she will not fall;God will help her at break of day

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️

I hope your saturday has been filled with moments that you smile and feel appreciated.You truly are a rockstar to me by simply being who you are.I know your presence lit up everyone around you today. After a long day ,I hope you find comfort in knowing how much you're valued and loved.Remember,it's okay to rest and recharge;you've earned it.I'm proud of you ms sunshine , Always ( ps. i hope you killed it with viewing today )
